law.catch_line: Refusal, suspension, or revocation of permit -- Appeal.
law.text: Any permit may be suspended or canceled by the Division of Animal Health, after opportunity for a hearing to be conducted in accordance with KRS Chapter 13B, for any violation of KRS 257.370 to 257.460 or the regulations promulgated under KRS 257.370 to 257.460. Any person who is refused a permit or whose permit is revoked after a hearing may appeal the final order to the Circuit Court of Franklin County in accordance with KRS Chapter 13B.
law.history: Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 49, sec. 15, effective July 15, 2002. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 318, sec. 182, effective July 15, 1996. -- Created 1948 Ky. Acts ch. 165, sec. 8.
